songs.title: Masam Gunah
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]

Dressed like an Indian prince baby
You lookin fine and so mighty
Hot cold can I take a bit baby
Be your first fruit burst lady

[Pre-Chorus]

So take it slow
Move my boat
Shake it more
I can take it all

[Chorus]

Masam Gunah ah ah
Take it to the next level
If you want another medal
Gunah ah ah
Masam Gunah ah ah
